name: Dinari RDDT
description: ### What is the project about? The Dinari dShare token for Reddit stock (RDDT.d) is a 1:1 backed token representing shares of Reddit, Inc. RDDT.d enables users to gain exposure to Reddit's equity through a tokenized format, harnessing the advantages of blockchain technology. Each RDDT.d token is fully backed by a corresponding share of Reddit stock, held securely in a transparent treasury vault. This tokenization offers investors enhanced transferability, instant settlement, 24/7 trading, and fractional ownership, increasing the accessibility and liquidity of Reddit stock for a broader range of investors.
